reviewText: Department store window dresser, Willie, mistakenly commits to supporting an orphan. While visiting the orphanage regularly, he falls in love with the little boys nurse. This romantic comedy is one of the best of the early talkies. Its well-written and well-acted. There are typical PreCode scenes and situations, outrageous antics, and hilarious bits. This gem is a tender love story packed with giggles. Youll enjoy this must see viewing experience from opening credits to THE END.
